kit.leader_skill: "Uncontrollable Power" Category Ki +4 and HP, ATK & DEF +150%

super_attack.name: Meteor Crush (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK for 1 turn; Causes colossal damage to enemy; Lowers ATK

ultra_super_attack.name: Eraser Cannon (Extreme)
ultra_super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes mega-colossal damage to enemy

passive_skill.name: Last Remaining Battle Instinct
passive_skill.effect: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is another "Uncontrollable Power" Category ally on the team upon the character's entry: (Once) Ki +8 to 10 randomly at the start of turn, recovers 26% HP at the end of turn and launches an additional Super Attack for 4 turn(s); (Once) Ki +3; (Once) High chance of performing a critical hit; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 180% up; Damage reduction rate 30% up; When all allies attacking in the same turn are "Uncontrollable Power" Category characters: Damage reduction rate 30% up; For every turn passed: (Forever) Chance of performing a critical hit & damage reduction rate 6% up (up to 30%); Starting from the 7th turn from the character's entry turn: (Forever) Damage reduction rate 6% down for every turn passed (no more than -30%)

lines.text: Ki +8 to 10 randomly at the start of turn, recovers 26% HP at the end of turn and launches an additional Super Attack for 4 turn(s)
lines.context: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is another "Uncontrollable Power" Category ally on the team upon the character's entry
Activates the Entrance Animation when there is another "Uncontrollable Power" Category ally on the team upon the character's entry

lines.text: High chance of performing a critical hit
lines.context: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is another "Uncontrollable Power" Category ally on the team upon the character's entry
When attacking with 12 or more Ki
When attacking with 12 or more Ki
When all allies attacking in the same turn are "Uncontrollable Power" Category characters

lines.text: Chance of performing a critical hit & damage reduction rate 6% up (up to 30%)
lines.context: For every turn passed

lines.text: Damage reduction rate 6% down for every turn passed (no more than -30%)
lines.context: Starting from the 7th turn from the character's entry turn

active_skill.name: Ultra Genome Ray
active_skill.effect: Massively raises ATK temporarily; Causes ultimate damage to enemy; Guards all attacks; Directs enemy's attack; towards the character for 1 turn
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated when all allies attacking in the same turn are "Uncontrollable Power" Category characters starting from the 6th turn from the character's entry turn (once only)
